challenge.title: Introduction to High Performance Scientific Computing - Chapter 8
challenge.description: Victor Eijkhout, Edmond Chow, and Robert van de Geijn's Introduction to High Performance Scientific Computing introduces scientific computing theory and application.
challenge.instructions: Read Victor Eijkhout's Introduction to High Performance Scientific Computing Chapter Eight and complete all questions with provided solutions.
